text: :  . ,  . Wood (trading locally as JSC WOOD KSS) is currently recruiting for a Document Control Specialist with extensive experience in the oil and gas petrochemical industry (KZ passport holders). Responsible for routing, recording, monitoring, and expediting office checks of engineering and supplier data as required. Interfaces with reproduction department for required reproduction associated with distribution of engineering, supplier, and technical data. Accumulates certified supplier data and other required technical documents. Requirements: Experience in Engineering Office Document Management. Knowledge of Document management systems. Knowledge of DATA management systems. Experienced with spreadsheets and standard templates. DCC and Management skills acquired through 3 years office experience. Good English language skills.

Полная занятость, полный день

Wood (trading locally as JSC WOOD KSS) is currently recruiting for a Document Control Specialist with extensive experience in the oil and gas petrochemical industry (KZ passport holders).

  • Responsible for routing, recording, monitoring, and expediting office checks of engineering and supplier data as required.
  • Interfaces with reproduction department for required reproduction associated with distribution of engineering, supplier, and technical data.
  • Accumulates certified supplier data and other required technical documents.

Requirements:

  • Experience in Engineering Office Document Management

  • Knowledge of Document management systems.
    Knowledge of DATA management systems.
    Experienced with spreadsheets and standard templates
    DCC and Management skills acquired through 3 years office experience

    Good English language skills

Ключевые навыки

Английский язык
